articles.content: Earlier today, Microsoft shared the news that regulatory review of its deal to acquire ZeniMax Media has completed, meaning Bethesda is part of Xbox first-party family of studios. Bethesda Softworks … [+932 chars]

articles.title: Apple Women's Health Study releases preliminary data to help destigmatize menstrual symptoms - Apple Newsroom
articles.description: The Apple Women’s Health Study team at Harvard Chan School released a preliminary study update on women and their menstrual symptoms.
articles.content: The landmark studys first set of data is significant in its scope and scale, offering insights into menstruation and the experiences of women across the US

articles.author: Kim Lyons
articles.title: The Fitbit Ace 3 is its latest fitness tracker for kids - The Verge
articles.description: The Fitbit Ace 3 is designed for kids ages six and up, and it has some new features from the Ace 2, including new animated clock faces, customizable accessories, and new colors. It also boasts battery life of up to eight hours.
articles.content:
Designed for children ages six and up, the new model adds do not disturb and sleep modes
Fitbit
Fitbit has introduced the third iteration of its Ace activity and sleep tracker for kids. The Fitbit … [+1519 chars]
